nodes.bodyText: Looking at the ticket I would have expected size-2
Yeah me too but it was implemented to just show the first mod and then the number if there are more than two mods. I would guess because some mods have long names
But then the if-statement makes no sense? Shouldn't that be > 1 then? And the i18n string is also misleading...
Yeah I can change the string title. And if there are 2 then it shows both names if there are more than two it shows name and n more
